title: Soft Liquor Licenses for all establishments registered with SLTDA; Cabinet gives the green light
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Cabinet of Ministers granted approval to the proposal to issue Soft Liquor Licenses to all establishments registered with the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority.
In a tweet, Tourism Minister Harin Fernando said that this applies to all establishments registered with the SLTDS that provide food, drinks, and accommodation.
